name: Lori
description:
Help Lori escape her (after)lifelong home in her quest to leave ghostliness behind and become REAL! 

 But to bust through the walls of this haunted mansion (and leave her old incorporeal self in the dust), she'll have to get metaphysical….

Code and art: Spotted_Leaf

Music and sound: SeimeiNoNagare

This is an entry for the Brackeys game jam 2022!
